jeopardy_round: & A BIBLE PERSON TO BE NAMED LATER

(1, 1).clue: Neale Donald Walsch, author of "Conversations with" this being, says that anybody can have them

(2, 1).clue: The personification of freezing weather, he might nip at your nose

(3, 1).clue: In Italian minestrina is a thin soup; this related word describes a thick vegetable soup

(4, 1).clue: Oscar Wilde made a veiled reference to this woman, unnamed in the Bible when she danced before Herod

(6, 3).clue: A player at bat,your dog,the plank

(2, 4).clue: Term for someone who tries anything & everything but is not an expert in any one field

(6, 4).clue: A sword, a bitter pill,your words

(2, 1).clue: Term for the decade just before the turn of the 19th to the 20th century
